name: Scrapgaming
description:
Submission for GAMEDEV CUNI JAM 2022.

Theme: THE FIRST EVER!

My interpretation of theme is scrapbooks which are used for preserving 'first ever' moments with some photos and notes. Every scrapbook has a theme and I've picked video game history as the topic of mine. 

How to Play?

  • Use arrows keys to move around - You can move freely on the edges. However, once you leave the edge, you need to continue in the same direction till you reach the opposite edge. (you are stuck with your 'first ever' move till you reach the destination)
  • Your move is step by step with every key press - this means you can stop and wait to avoid the enemy and shots, but no turning back!
  • Your goal is to clean the grid and reveal the scrapbook page underneath.
  • You clean each cell by spending some time on it - if you move fast, cell may not be completely cleaned (but you can come back to it again and clean fully)

SPOILERS! There are 3 levels with 3 'first ever' games in video game history, as there are multiple opinions on which video game was the first. Collect these 3 pages of the video game scrapbook to finish the game successfully!

  • Tennis for Two
  • Pong
  • Computer Space

Solo developed in Unity3D with help of Photoshop & Aseprite.
